name: UnofficialVeronaCountryViewSchoolMenu
0:
”Alexa ask Lunch Lady what's for lunch tomorrow?”
”Alexa ask Lunch Lady what is for lunch next Monday?”
”Alexa ask lunch lady what's today's lunch?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunch lady
des: The unofficial Verona School Menu is a skill that reads out the breakfast and lunch menus for the Verona School District in Wisconsin. It helps parents with active meal planning for their children. Simply say "Alexa, ask Lunch Lady what is for lunch today?" and she will read out a list of menu items.
